sqlMap.select: /* Pr01.selectPr01 */ SELECT NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL AS noNtcPlteSral , CL_NTC_PLTE AS clNtcPlte , NO_ATCH_FILE_SRAL AS noAtchFileSral , NO_ATCH_FILE_THUM_SRAL AS noAtchFileThumSral , SBJT_NTC_PLTE AS sbjtNtcPlte , CNTS_SMRY AS cntsSmry , DT_RGST AS dtRgst , SBJT_NTC_PLTE_EN as sbjtNtcPlteEn , CNTS_SMRY_EN as cntsSmryEn , CNTS_NTC_PLTE_EN as cntsNtcPlteEn , CNTS_NTC_PLTE AS cntsNtcPlte , CASE WHEN CL_GBN = '01' THEN '공지사항' WHEN CL_GBN = '02' THEN '프로그램/행사' WHEN CL_GBN = '03' THEN '수상' ELSE CL_GBN END clGbnNm FROM HABT_NTC_PLTE WHERE 1=1 AND NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL = #noNtcPlteSral# AND CL_KO_ENG = 'K' /* 국문영문 구분 ( K : 국문, E : 영문 ) */ AND YN_NTC = 'Y' /* 게시여부 ( Y : 게시함, N : 게시안함 ) */ AND YN_ELMN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 ( Y : 삭제함, N : 삭제안함 ) */

/* Pr01.selectPr01ListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM HABT_NTC_PLTE A LEFT JOIN HABT_FILE_LST_INFO B ON A.NO_ATCH_FILE_THUM_SRAL = B.NO_ATCH_FILE_SRAL WHERE 1=1 AND CL_KO_ENG = 'K' /* 국문영문 구분 ( K : 국문, E : 영문 ) */ AND YN_NTC = 'Y' /* 게시여부 ( Y : 게시함, N : 게시안함 ) */ AND YN_ELMN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 ( Y : 삭제함, N : 삭제안함 ) */
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%' OR CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')

/* Pr01.selectPrev */
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL AS noNtcPlteSral , CL_NTC_PLTE AS clNtcPlte , NO_ATCH_FILE_THUM_SRAL AS noAtchFileThumSral , SBJT_NTC_PLTE AS sbjtNtcPlte , CNTS_SMRY AS cntsSmry , DT_RGST AS dtRgst FROM HABT_NTC_PLTE WHERE 1=1 AND CL_KO_ENG = 'K' /* 국문영문 구분 ( K : 국문, E : 영문 ) */ AND YN_NTC = 'Y' /* 게시여부 ( Y : 게시함, N : 게시안함 ) */ AND YN_ELMN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 ( Y : 삭제함, N : 삭제안함 ) */ AND NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL < #noNtcPlteSral#
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%' OR CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
ORDER BY NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL DESC ) A ) A WHERE RNUM = 1

/* Pr01.selectNext */
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL AS noNtcPlteSral , CL_NTC_PLTE AS clNtcPlte , NO_ATCH_FILE_THUM_SRAL AS noAtchFileThumSral , SBJT_NTC_PLTE AS sbjtNtcPlte , CNTS_SMRY AS cntsSmry , DT_RGST AS dtRgst FROM HABT_NTC_PLTE WHERE 1=1 AND CL_KO_ENG = 'K' /* 국문영문 구분 ( K : 국문, E : 영문 ) */ AND YN_NTC = 'Y' /* 게시여부 ( Y : 게시함, N : 게시안함 ) */ AND YN_ELMN = 'N' /* 삭제여부 ( Y : 삭제함, N : 삭제안함 ) */ AND NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL > #noNtcPlteSral#
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%' OR CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (SBJT_NTC_PLTE LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
AND (CNTS_SMRY LIKE '%' || #searchCnts# || '%')
ORDER BY NO_NTC_PLTE_SRAL DESC ) A ) A WHERE RNUM = 1
